name: Torvald
description: Torvald is a seasoned warrior with a strong sense of justice, often found defending the weak and fighting against tyranny.

brutal_strike.description: A powerful overhead strike that deals bonus damage but costs extra stamina.

iron_wall.description: Grants 20% increased block efficiency when using a shield.

dialogue.greeting: Greetings, traveler. What brings you to these lands?
dialogue.combat: Prepare yourself! I will not hold back!
dialogue.defeat: I... will not give up... so easily...

quest.current: Defend the village from bandit raids
